metadata.title: CVE-2020-27507 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The Kamailio SIP before 5.5.0 server mishandles INVITE requests withduplicated fields and overlength tag, leading to a buffer overflow thatcrashes the server or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: kamailio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
